Html:
Hi all,

I've been trying to install SQL Server Express all day.  The install wizard shows every step as successful, but in the end I only have Configuration Tools and Import/Export Data - no
MS SQL Server Database Engine.

A colleague of mine has the path to the exe as:

"C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\90\Tools\Binn\VSShell\Common7\IDE\ssmsee.exe"

I do not have a Tools folder under my 90 folder.

I'm running XP sp3.

All help/suggestions are appreciated!
Try this thread to see if it answers your question: http://www.codeplex.com/SqlServerSamples/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=33751
